website_summaries.verdict: Offered in multiple colorways, the TOMS Carlo is a retro-looking sneaker that has a modest appearance. Many of its wearers are in agreement that this low-top is light and comfortable. While most of the feedback is about the exterior, a few also commended the moderate cushioning and arch support. While most of the reviews are positive, buyers have to be aware of the possibility that the TOMS Carlo runs large.
pros: Plenty of wearers appreciated the low-top’s moderate arch support
The slight cushioning quality of the TOMS Carlo is praised by a couple of users
Some described the cushioning as “not too soft or too hard, just the right amount.”
Many commenters implied that this footwear is an excellent choice during holiday strolls, specifically on urban areas
According to a lot of TOMS men's Carlo burlap sneaker reviews, it is low-key stylish and could be paired with a multitude of lifestyle clothes
A customer particularly liked the flexibility of the TOMS Carlo
There are some purchasers who expressed their desire to buy another pair because of its overall features
A number of shoppers are delighted of the low-top’s budget-friendly price tag
The majority of its wearers said that the TOMS men's Carlo sneaker feels comfortable
cons: A considerable number of reviewers shared that the Carlo from TOMS runs large
One of the customers is not satisfied because there wasn’t ample room on the interior for a custom insole
Durability is at best doubtful, as per a purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Fit is true to size but they really suck
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a decent pair of shoes that I could wear with no socks. These are not them. They hurt like heck. Even with socks on the back part over my achilles tendon cuts into my skin. Really painful. Definitely need to wear with socks (unless your feet are made of wood). Would not buy again. The quality seems reasonable otherwise, hence 2 and not 1 star
customer_reviews.author: Michael Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice pair of shoes, but the sizing is a bit unusual. It's as though Tom's doesn't make shoes in half-sizes. Although I ordered a 10.5, the shoe that came in the mail was labeled as 10 - 10.5 and was a bit too snug. Not a big deal, as Amazon let me return it for a refund and order a size 11. Just something to be aware of - it might be a bit smaller than you're expecting if you order a half-size.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, minor fit issue though
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's not suede, but looks like the description has changed - mine is black canvas. Good shoe, more "formed" and solid than the softer Tom's shoes, looks a little less casual. Odd though, the right shoe was loose around my heel and I squeaked when I walked. The Mrs. made fun of it to the point I bought a heel insert. Anyway, other than that, comfortable shoe, and just a little less casual that the other Tom's I usually buy. Easy to wash, just remove the insole and dunk them in cool water with some mild soap for a few minutes and air dry overnight.
customer_reviews.author: M. CarterTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Way too narrow to keep wearing
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are insanely narrow. I have narrow feet but these are absurd. After two days of walking in these shoes I have foot damage. I'll never wear them again. 50 dollars wasted.
customer_reviews.author: M Baggs

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable AF
customer_reviews.text: The heels on these are extremely uncomfortable. I thought I could wear these without socks like other plimsolls, but oh boy was I wrong. The heel on these have now tasted human blood and crave more. I've tried wearing them with socks, but the bad memories are forever ingrained upon my heels.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael R.

customer_reviews.title: These shoes will not last 6 months
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit well but sadly they are garbage. I have owned them for less than 6 months and they are ripping and falling apart. What’s more annoying than that was when I tried to reach out to TOMS, Zappos and Amazon for a warranty claim. All I got was a run around and I am still stuck with a pair of shoes that are junk. I will never buy TOMS again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but very narrow
customer_reviews.text: These are nice looking shoes, however extremely narrow. More narrow than anything else in this shoe category (i.e. vans, converse). Worth trying on but require feet more narrow than average.
customer_reviews.author: Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Lovely. Here's some info on how they fit:
customer_reviews.text: They can be a little tight at first, but will stretch out a bit over time if they are. If you're new to Toms, make sure to check sizing chart and measure your feet. Insole is okay--it's flat foam (no arch support). It's glued down, but can be ripped out, with some effort, to replace. Overall they are good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and style.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and feels good. Can beat the price and vegan is by style so I’m happy to buy these and support a company that makes theee shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the material these are made of. It attracts animal hair and then it's really hard to get it off. I also don't like the total lack of coushion in the soles.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut Butter

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to Vans and they appear to be better made....
customer_reviews.text: We'll see how they hold up. I hope they wear as well as my vans do. Bought these because I love slip-on loafers and Vans discontinued the color oatmeal.
customer_reviews.author: sailorguy

customer_reviews.title: My Sons favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Currently owe 3 pairs of Toms in brown, blue and Black! Best all around casual to dressy men’s shoes.
customer_reviews.author: KNak

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair very similar to this new pair started out snug but now it is one of the most comfortable shoes that I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: john ryan

customer_reviews.title: Recommended highly!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes. Comfort,nice looking, low price... if course I will by again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Adams

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised. It’s more of a round like van shoes and not advertised in pic. Two spectate items. The main Pg shows different item and when shipped it shows another item but similar in color. Might be a fake Tom’s.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: A little tight but ok
customer_reviews.text: It's a little small. Make sure you order a size bigger
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Go-To Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These slip-ons are comfortable and useful for any number of occasions. They're one of my daily-wear shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Logan

customer_reviews.title: Stay away black turns into dark gray
customer_reviews.text: Shoes faded immediately. Color did not last all waste of my money
customer_reviews.author: Carlos martinez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome slip on shoes
customer_reviews.text: Finally found my perfect slip on shoe. Would highly recommend these for anyone who is looking for a comfortable/stylish slip on shoe
customer_reviews.author: Brian Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself is great! It is good looking and comfortable. The only downside is that the shoe runs small. I had to return my size nine for a size 10.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Not complaining husband. He have flat feet and wide. He has been using without any complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Pick it lady

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself is amazing but if you order these try getting a half size smaller because I usually wear a 10(M) in Toms and they fit perfectly but the bajas run a little bigger. So I would suggest getting a half size smaller. Other than that the shoes are amazing!!! I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend's favorite shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is the type to wear down shoes easily, brought these back in March & surprisingly, these shoes are still in good condition. He loves them so much & says they're super comfy!!
customer_reviews.author: Zuly

customer_reviews.title: They aren’t the actual sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I had to return them because the sneakers that arrived were not the ones in this picture.
customer_reviews.author: LuvBug

customer_reviews.title: Look Closely
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look great and feel great. Only downsize is they arrived with scuffs on the rubber rim? I’m not sure why brand new shoes would have that. I would return them a get a new pair but I bought for vacation and don’t have time to get them replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Not something I was thinking when looking for TOMS. Cost to much for something that didn't last long
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: every pair bought gets a poor person a pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: the idea of someone gets a pair of shoes that is poor because i bought a pair is amazing. i suggest the documentary about the company. the shoes are light , look good. not sure how long they will last.
customer_reviews.author: stephen m

customer_reviews.title: Too Tight
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these shoes before but this time the shoes were not fitting like they should even though I got the same size. I tried to return the shoes but I passed the return by date. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Manpreet Saini

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my feet for 12 hours at a time and these shoes don’t hurt. They’re lightweight and inexpensive, getting another pair for sure
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like it! Good material and the color is just what it shows in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Vanderlinde

customer_reviews.title: Great comfy throw on shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. Maybe would try going half size up but otherwise just a great throw on show. I can wear these all day on my feet and I dont have any pain. Also glad they give a pair to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Makeyouastar

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these. So easy to slip on and off and very comfortable. Wear these every day.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Polyester...mhmmm...
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is great, the only issue is that when you use it quite a bit, they get worn out very quick. I purchase these in December 2018, and it is March 2019 and the shoes are not as presentable as they were when worn the first times. So in this shoe could last you 6 months without heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Dennirex

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Was a little snug at first but now fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Great show but worn, not cleaned and returned!!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great but it was very obvious that had been worn and returned by a previous owner. We cleaned them ourselves and kept them but was disappointed that they arrived in such a state.
customer_reviews.author: christine hecker

customer_reviews.title: A little on the narrow side
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good pair a shoes. Mind it, my feet are a tad bit wide, so the 9.5's are a little tight. But I removed the insole and put in a lower profile one, from a pair of vans I had, and that did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Hokulea808

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that they would be a little tight due to the other reviews, but after 3-4 times wearing them they fit great! Love the look and they are super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Tad Keely

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on clouds!
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn. They are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item received
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered the wrong item. Gonna have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Zoso

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoe for price
customer_reviews.text: I just wish there was a little more padding in the shoe. It could be more comfortable but overall a great shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A

customer_reviews.title: Heals will bleed!
customer_reviews.text: The back of my heals got tore up raw. Need bandaid to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Awful quality. Already falling apart a month and a half after purchase. Not recommended for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit a little large but fantastic shoe. Love the clean look and they’re pretty comfy too.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the style and feel of these shoes! They're a great fit too
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: False picture
customer_reviews.text: Shows a picture of a ladies boot but actually a men's shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Perry

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: Once you wear Toms you’ll never go back to an other shoe!
customer_reviews.author: lourie lopez

customer_reviews.title: Different shoe strings
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come with the brown leather shoe strings like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and style
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fit and style. Perfect for casual and semi-final events
customer_reviews.author: Greg_GW

customer_reviews.text: The top part looses its solid shape after 3-4 times of use.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas.

customer_reviews.title: Love these Booties!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time purchasing Tom booties. I'm so glad I did! The quality is exceptional and fit is good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Think if I'd got them two sizes smaller than usual id be fine. I did get them one size smaller to ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine chafe. Think if I'd got them two sizes smaller than usual id be fine. I did get them one size smaller to go barefoot.
customer_reviews.author: C BOYD

product_meta.title: TOMS Men's Carlo Black Trainers
product_meta.description: Sneakers Man Toms Men Carlo Black 10013258
feature_bullets: With every pair of shoes you purchase, TOMS® will give a new pair of shoes to a child in need. One for One®.
The TOMS® Carlo sneaker offers a relaxed style with a retro silhouette that makes it the ideal casual choice for all-day wear.

Traditional lace-up closure. Vegan-friendly construction. Faux-leather detailing on back heel. Lightweight, flexible strobel construction. Breathable textile lining for added comfort. Ortholite® high-rebound cushioned insole provides underfoot comfort and support. Durable rubber outsole with herringbone tread pattern. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 10 oz Product measurements were taken using size 12, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight
